patterns: anyways wanna talk about stray kids?
responses: ok what should we start with first?

through the 2017 JYP Entertainment survival reality show Stray Kids, which followed trainees forming a group with Bang Chan picking members, leading to their official March 25, 2018 debut with the EP I Am Not and hit District 9. Before the official launch, they released a pre-debut album, Mixtape, showcasing their self-produced work, solidifying their unique, self-producing identity.

bang chan, the leader, and felix were born in sydney/melbourne, australia. bang chan was born on oct 3rd, 1997 and felix was born on sept 15, 2000. lee know was born in gimpo, south korea on oct 25, 1998. changbin was born in yongin, south korea on aug 11, 1999. hyunjin was born in seoul, south korea on mar 20, 2000. han was born in incheon, south korea on sept 14, 2000. seungmin was born in seoul, south korea on sept 22, 2000. I.N was born in gwangju, south korea on feb 8, 2001.
